title: Medsafetybench: Evaluating and improving the medical safety of large language models

abstract: As large language models (LLMs) develop increasingly sophisticated capabilities and find applications in medical settings, it becomes important to assess their medical safety due to their far-reaching implications for personal and public health …

title: Automated Medical Report Generation for ECG Data: Bridging Medical Text and Signal Processing with Deep Learning
details: A Bleich, A Linnemann, BH Diem, TOF Conrad - arXiv preprint arXiv:2412.04067, 2024
abstract: Recent advances in deep learning and natural language generation have significantly improved image captioning, enabling automated, human-like descriptions for visual content. In this work, we apply these captioning techniques to …
